thread.section_title: Bravofly.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bravofly.com | www.bravofly.com
thread.title: Nassrin Baghban

author: Nassrin Baghban
title: Nassrin Baghban
text: I booked my Hotel+Flight and after one day of booking, I realised that there is problem with optaining visa for the host country, I traied to cancel and get refund, but after a week still I haven't received anything and I've been told they only refund less than a1% of money that I have paid, this means I am losing lots of hard cash earned, and this is very much painful.
